subject: How to test Graphics and Events in  Swings?
msgSnippet: Hi, I am writing an application for testing Swings GUI Applications. In which I have to test the Graphics font sizes and widths. Could any one please help
messageBody:
Hi,

I am writing an application for testing Swings GUI Applications.
In which I have to test the Graphics font sizes and widths.

Could any one please help me how to use junit in this case?

Also I have to test the events generated(button click,menu button click etc.)

Could any one please help me how to use junit in the case of testing the events generated?

Thanks,

Rajeev

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
